name: 100 Ball Brick Breaker
description:
My first game jam!

Mini Jam 100 - Also, my first time with ct.js. I was literally doing the space shooter demo on day 1 of the jam lol. Anyway, RUSHED to get this out, and learned a lot about ct.js. It's an amazing little game engine, but I got hung up on things a lot. I think it's worth to contribute to the ct.js project. I am really impressed with it.

(I am missing something to make it work with touch/mobile. Sorry...)
